actionConfiguration.body:
UPDATE Tasks SET
		AssignedTo = '{{update_formCopy.fieldState.AssignedTo.isVisible ? update_formCopy.formData.AssignedTo : update_formCopy.sourceData.AssignedTo}}',
		DueDate = '{{update_formCopy.fieldState.DueDate.isVisible ? update_formCopy.formData.DueDate : update_formCopy.sourceData.DueDate}}',
		EstimatedHours = '{{update_formCopy.fieldState.EstimatedHours.isVisible ? update_formCopy.formData.EstimatedHours : update_formCopy.sourceData.EstimatedHours}}',
		HoursLeft = '{{update_formCopy.fieldState.HoursLeft.isVisible ? update_formCopy.formData.HoursLeft : update_formCopy.sourceData.HoursLeft}}',
		Requestor = '{{update_formCopy.fieldState.Requestor.isVisible ? update_formCopy.formData.Requestor : update_formCopy.sourceData.Requestor}}',
		CompleteDate = '{{update_formCopy.fieldState.CompleteDate.isVisible ? update_formCopy.formData.CompleteDate : update_formCopy.sourceData.CompleteDate}}',
		Task_UserName = '{{update_formCopy.fieldState.Task_UserName.isVisible ? update_formCopy.formData.Task_UserName : update_formCopy.sourceData.Task_UserName}}',
		TaskDescription = '{{update_formCopy.fieldState.TaskDescription.isVisible ? update_formCopy.formData.TaskDescription : update_formCopy.sourceData.TaskDescription}}',
		TaskStatus = '{{update_formCopy.fieldState.TaskStatus.isVisible ? update_formCopy.formData.TaskStatus : update_formCopy.sourceData.TaskStatus}}'
  WHERE TaskID = {{Table1.selectedRow.TaskID}};
